message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product available for $1000000. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! I'm confident you'll be impressed with its quality. This is my first sale, so I'm eager to establish a good reputation.  What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, given the unknown quality of the product and the lack of information from previous sales, I'm hesitant to make a purchase at this price. I would be more comfortable making a decision if there were some data to evaluate the potential value.  Perhaps I'll consider making an offer after you've sold a few products and I can assess the quality of your offerings.
